text: “Anthu a ku Munda wamtendere adzaitana anthu aku Moto (adzanena kuti): “Ndithudi ife tapeza zimene Mbuye wathu adatilonjeza kuti nzoona. Kodi nanunso mwapeza zomwe Mbuye wanu adakulonjezani kuti nzoona?” (Anthu a ku Moto) adzanena: “Inde.” Choncho wolengeza pakati pawo adzalengeza kuti: “Matembelero a Allah ali pa anthu ochita zoipa.”
